ValidationRule.description: Checks if the product lookup, Business Area, Dimension A , Dimension B is maintained empty if the finished goods have these values populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( ISBLANK( FinishedGoods__c ) ), OR(AND(ISCHANGED( DimensionA__c ),NOT(ISBLANK(DimensionA__c ))) , AND(ISCHANGED( DimensionB__c ),NOT(ISBLANK(DimensionB__c ))) , AND(ISCHANGED( Product__c ),NOT(ISBLANK(Product__c))) , AND(ISCHANGED( BusinessArea__c ), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT((BusinessArea__c )))))), NOT($Setup.ByPassLogic__c.ByPassValidation__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This field cannot be populated because a material number has already been selected.
